Services available

Capp and son electricians offer a full range of electrical services, specialising in domestic work. Here are some of the things we do:

Outside & garden electrics
  • Security flood lights
  • Security wall lights
  • Time switches
  • P.I.R Detectors
  • Shed and garage electrics
  • Wood cabins
  • Garden lighting
  • Garden and driveway lighting
  • Pond electrics
  • Hot tubs
  • Outside sockets
  • Home CCTV security systems
Kitchen electrics
  • Wiring up cookers & hobs
  • Cookers hoods
  • New extra sockets
  • Down lights and light fittings
  • Wall fans
  • Extractor fans
Bathroom electrics
  • Wall fans
  • Down lights & light fittings
  • Electric showers
  • Pump power showers
  • Immersion heaters
  • Water heaters
  • Ceiling & wall extractor fans
Power supplies
  • Replacement fuse boards to R.C.D consumer units
  • Earthing upgrades
  • Water
  • Gas
  • Other methods
Heating
  • Night storage heaters
  • Convector type heaters
  • Supplies for central heating
General electrics
  • New lighting
  • Down lights
  • Main lighting
  • New switches
  • New/extra power points
  • TV points
  • Phone points
  • Fault-finding
